conversations.content: We've made it to the beach. The cat we're looking for should be around here.
Mineuchiii! Mineuchi, hearken to me!
Easy, Mikoto. Word around town is that the cat can often be found here.
It's a pretty tall tale, though. Can't say I've ever heard of a cat with a penchant for wave-riding.
Most felines loathe water's liquid embrace, but not my Mineuchi. He would oft splash about through oceans and rivers alike.
And back when I would practice slicing the sea in twain, Mineuchi would skillfully use boards from destroyed ships to navigate the raging currents.
(Did he just say ＂slicing the sea in twain＂?)
Look! Over there!
H-hey, wait— Aaand he's gone.
Hm? Who are you folks?
Are you the one they call Surfer? The owner of the cat who rides the waves?
Er, well, that's just what they call people who ride the waves, it's not my actual name. But I mean, yeah, I am THAT surfer.
So what can I do you for, bud?
We're here to follow up on a rumor.
Have you seen a skinny black tomcat around here? He answers to the name Mineuchi.
Huh. So you're not with those dudes who came by earlier, then.
Er, which ＂dudes＂ would those be?
Oh, sorry, bro. Just thinkin' out loud. Anyway, I hate to say it, but I don't think you'll find the cat you're after 'round here.
Saw one like it a while back, but it scampered off to who-knows-where.
Darn. I guess the trail's gone cold.
Meow.
Sir, if I'm not mistaken, that cat's countenance suggests that it has something to say.
Oh, yeah, totally. He's yowlin' at me for a little tandem riding. My cats always go out surfin' with me.
Sounds like our cue to give you some space, then. Happy surfing, sir.
'Preciate the good vibes, but I'm nursin' a bum foot. Don't think I'll be out on a board anytime soon.
Meow.
I feel bad for these little guys, but it ain't like we've got anyone else around here who can surf, so...
I'll do it.
Uh, what?
I'll take your place. I will traverse the seafoam with your cats.
Bro, no way! It's way easier said than done! You're not—wait, ARE you a surfer?
Fear not. In attaining revelation, I have become as nature itself. The sea is but a part of me.
I...ain't got a clue what that means, but I can tell you've got the soul of a surfer. Paddle on out and show me how hard you can shred!
Akaw! This dude's catchin' huge waves like it's his JOB! He's like...the sea itself!
Meeeow!
Aww. The cat looks like it's having fun, too.
Looks like they're paddlin' back in.
Ahhh. That was rather refreshing. Mineuchi and I used to enjoy many such moments together.
Meeeow!
Someone sure is happier 'n a shucked oyster! Guess you were really dyin' to take a ride, huh? Gah ha ha!
Mineuchi... Where are you now? Are you as happy as this cat is?
Suppose you ARE someplace new, living a blissful existence without me. Do I have the right to intrude upon that...?
Hah!
Akaw! You nailed a fish swimmin' through the water like it was nothing! My dude, you are a LEGEND.
The key is attuning yourself to your prey's breath. Match it, and you will strike true— no matter how fiercely the water rages.
I still don't have a clue what you're goin' on about, but I appreciate you, bro! Even my cats are amped!
Meow!
Heh. I used to share the fish I caught with Mineuchi like this, too.
Man, this Mineuchi musta been like family to you—just like these little party animals are to me.
Indeed. He was.
Meow.
Huh? You gettin' antsy again already? Hey, sorry to ask, but would you take my little guys out on the water again?
I'd be happy to.
Meow.
Heh. Fun, is it?
Meow-meow!
I see... Very well, then. Hold on tight.
Meow!
Phew. That ought to do it for today.
Meeeow!
You have a righteous day out there, little guy? Gah ha ha!
And hey, thanks again, bro. I owe you one.
Think nothing of it. It is enjoyable for both of us. That cat really is your Mineuchi.
Wait, what? I thought you said Mineuchi was an all-black cat.
I speak figuratively—of the relationship the two of you share. Mineuchi was irreplaceable to me.
We would share the fish we caught in the morning, spend the afternoon gazing at the breaking waves, and huddle together as we counted the stars in the night sky.
Our days spent living in harmony with the ocean feel like they were only yesterday.
Even so, our companionship was predicated upon more than a mutual love of the beach. Only... I didn't realize it.
I poured my heart into my training, ignorant of how much I valued him, and then before I knew it, our paths had diverged.
It was only when I lost him that I at last realized just how much he meant to me.
Perhaps Mineuchi sensed that I took his presence for granted, devoted as I was to my training. In a word, I was unworthy.
I failed to be for Mineuchi what you are for those cats.
Listen, bro. I dunno your whole life story, but here's the thing about cats— they decide for themselves exactly where they wanna be and when.
And if that Mineuchi of yours is alive, I'm sure he's out there livin' his best life.
Meow.
The cat chose to be with you, and then chose to set off in search of new horizons. That's not on you, my dude.
I do not search for Mineuchi solely because I feel responsible for his fate. I will find him—
And then what? You're gonna yank him outta his new life and bring him back home to you? You really think that's gonna make him happy?
Look, bro. I can tell you ain't the kinda guy who goes around messin' with cats and their happiness. ...Unlike those mental dudes from before.
You let slip something about them earlier. Of whom do you speak?
Just a couple of bennies some rich dude hired out. They heard the rumors about surfing cats and showed up to sniff around.
They didn't know the first thing about my furry friends, but they tried to take 'em away just the same. They're the punks who raked me over and messed up my leg.
Have they come back since then?
Not since you showed up. If I had to guess, they're probably stayin' in line since they can tell you ain't some ordinary grom.
Good. May it remain that way.
I mean, I'm pretty sure you'd be fine even if they DID try to mess with you. Just keep your eyes peeled, yeah?
Meow?
What is it?
Nothing. It...must've been my imagination.
...Hmph.
Hah!
Meeeeow!
Dude, a 360 air?! SICK!
You've gotta seriously be one with the water to land that kinda move—not to mention totally fearless! He is PRO-tier!
Guess he was for real when he said he's ＂nature itself.＂ Makes me wish I could be a cat ridin' tandem with him!
Hm. At a glance, the skies look clear, and yet... Yes, I can feel it.
Meow?
My apologies. Your safety is paramount, little one, so I am afraid we must cut our time short and head back.
Meeeow!
Yo! You're back sooner than I was expec—
Oof, it is MAD choppy all of a sudden... Wait, no way. Dude, don't tell me you somehow predicted that'd happen!
In attaining revelation, I have become as nature itself. The sea is but a part of me. Thus, I can perceive an omen of ill weather as simply as I draw breath.
Gah ha ha! Unbelievable! You're outta this world, my dude!
Meow!
Welp, guess we oughta call it a day. Gotta hurry and get the cats back to my beach hut before the sky breaks open.
Meow!
Mineuchi...
Hrm? Who are you?
What?! How'd you— Err, forget that. You say you're looking for a skinny black cat?
What do you know? Tell me, please!
Saw him just recently, as luck would have it.
What? Where?! Where is Mineuchi?!
He's in the village due north of here. Yeah, that's the one.
Got it!
Uh, have a nice trip! ...Bah, he can't hear me. He's already a mile away.
He gone?
Yeah. Boy, that must be one important cat. Oh well!
Long as we got him far away from here, we're golden.
Now we just gots to get the surfin' cat to that rich so-and-so what wants it. Psh. This job ain't no sweat at all.
Hey, what say we start plannin' what we're gonna do with the reward?
Whoa, let's not get ahead of ourselves, bub! Heh, not that I'm one to talk— I already got myself this little piece.
Ohhh, that's a nice necklace! Maybe I'll get one too!
WAH HA HA HA HA!
Heeey! Mikoto! Did you find Mineuchi?
...No. There are 241 cats here, but Mineuchi is not among them.
(How did he...?)
Thank you for helping me search, but I expected this outcome. Mineuchi is a truly singular entity.
He is a cat among cats:  his graceful figure looms black as night, with omniscient eyes that watch the world.
In truth, I did not expect we would find him, given that I have already been pursuing him tirelessly for many years.
But even so, you still came here to search for him.
Of course. I would follow any lead in my quest to reunite with Mineuchi, no matter how outlandish.
I regret how things ended between us, and I vow to never let that happen again.
If that's how you feel, I'm certain you'll find Mineuchi. And I'll keep helping—
Meow!
Oh? Hello there, kitty.
This is one of the cats from the beach. It remembers that I caught a fish for it. But...why are you here, little one?
Meow! Meow!
Is it trying to tell you something?
What?! Danger on the beach?! Then I must hurry!
What?! Hey, wait, Mikoto!
Ya stubborn beach rat!
Ngah!
Sheesh, the sun's already set. This was supposed t' be an easy job...
Don't...lay a hand...on my cat!
Meow! Meow!
Hey, c'mon, now! You make it sound like we're the bad guys here! We's just tellin' YOU to hand over the cat, see?!
Gaah!
This is takin' too long, let's just grab the thing.
Meow! Meow!
What's going on here?!
Dammit, why the hell're THEY here? Let's hurry and get while the gettin's good!
Get WHERE?!
The sea! We'll row outta here on the boat and make a break for it!
B-but this wind.
It's curtains for us either way if those guys catch up! C'mon, it's time to sink or swim!
Y-you got a point! With the seas this rough, they won't be able to follow us, neither!
Hraaaaaaagh!
Stop!
How DARE you try to drag a cat away against its will, you fiends!
Uh, is that a bow and arrow?
Fuhgeddaboutit! Ain't no way he's hittin' us with this wind!
Gaaah! ARROW! IN! MY! FOOT!
You gotta be kiddin' me! How the hell'd he land that shot?!
I read the wind.
Ridiculous! That ain't humanly possible!
In attaining revelation, I have become as nature itself. I am human, I am the sea, and I am the wind as well.
The world undulates with nature's rhythm. Life's flame fades according to the cycle of providence. Your demise here is merely another part of that cycle.
Q-quit it! I ain't got a clue what any of that means, and it's creepin' me out!
Within me resides the will of the heavens. It demands justice for your deeds. Now, be silent and return to nature!
Meow! Meow!
Th-that sound—!
NOOOO! My cat's fallen overboard!
The cat escaped, but it got swept off by the current!
Hrk... I've gotta save him!
Wait! You can't do anything with those wounds!
I will go!
Huh?
Meow! Meow!
Fear not. I'm coming!
Stop, bro! It doesn't matter how good you are—paddlin' out into waves this rough is like signin' a death sentence!
*gasp* That wave! It's m-massive! If Mikoto gets pulled under, he's...
AGH! Mikoto, nooooo!
AGH! Mikoto, nooooo!
He disappeared under that wave! We've got to do something, quickly!
Wait, look there!
Fear not. I'm coming to save you!
Meow! Meow!
He's staying afloat, even with these raging waves... He might actually manage this!
Little early to be celebratin' there, bro. Weather like this means business.
Ridin' when the sun's out and ridin' in the dark are two completely different beasts!
At night, you got no visibility, so you can't see waves sneakin' up from behind. Not to mention that conditions're perfect for a riptide right about now.
Even for a total pro surfer, one screw-up out there could cost you everything.
Heh heh heh... HAAA HA HA! What kinda MORON puts himself in mortal freakin' peril just to save one stinkin' cat?!
Sure, it's far from sensible to plunge yourself into the ragin' seas—let alone at night—just to save one little cat...
...but that just goes to show how strong that guy is. If anyone can do this, it's him.
Rrrgh... Such ferocity. Nature's fury endeavors to swallow me whole.
But I am nature itself. These raging seas are but a part of me. I can do this... Nay, I was BORN to do this!
I've made it! Now I will save you!
Meow! Meow!
But a single misstep would have spelled our mutual doom. Phew. ...You seem more chipper than I expected.
Meow!
Yes, you can entrust the rest to me. As always, I bid you to rest easy and enjoy the ride.
Meow! Meow!
Oh, Mineuchi... Perhaps someday, we, too...
Meow meow!
Whoa, thank you! You saved my cat's life!
You needn't thank me. I am nature itself. The will of the heavens bid me to mount a rescue, and I simply obliged.
And it is by that same will that I shall punish those ruffians with impunity.
EEEEK!
F-forgive us! We won't come near you guys again! We'll forget about the cat, too! Heck, I'll forget about cats in general! Whiskers? Paw pads? Never heard of 'em!
Hm. And yet the outcome would not differ if I simply dealt with you where you stand. Now, shall I pierce you through, or...?
D-don't kill us! We'll talk to our client, too! We'll say not to mess with anyone 'round these parts EVER again!
That's not enough. No matter where it is— not just here—I will suffer no one to rob a single cat of their freedom. Ever.
Remember this: if you lot should ever again meddle in the affairs of cats, you will find NO MERCY!
Yessir! Whatever you say, sir! We're SOOORRY!
Now, with fear instilled in their hearts, I expect we've seen the last of them around here.
Bro, I can't thank you enough. For real.
Meow!
Looks like our furry friends are happy too!
Say. You wanna borrow one of my cats?
What do you mean?
Well, you've proved that you're trustworthy.
Meow.
You said something about my cat being just like your Mineuchi, right? I figured maybe he could stand in for him. Y'know?
Plus, the cats seem to trust you.  I'll sleep easy knowing he's in good hands. Whaddaya say?
I must refuse.
It is as you said before—cats are the masters of their own lives. As such, I would be betraying the natural order by imposing my own desires upon one.
It is best for cats to decide how and where they live out their days. This is true both for your cats...and for my Mineuchi, too.
Mikoto...
Meow.
Heh. Looks like my pals are gettin' hungry.
Meaning they want me to catch some fish.
Got it in one.
I can't disagree that the cats should be able to decide where they wanna be. But that doesn't mean they can only do one thing at a time.
As for the cats who choose to spend their time with me—I'm just one piece of the puzzle that makes up their little kitty lives. You feel me, bro?
And I think—no, I'm SURE it's the same for your cat Mineuchi.
I...see. You've helped me to discover another valuable perspective today.
Meow. Meow.
They sound pretty insistent, Mikoto.
Heh. Yes, yes, my frisky friends. You shall dine as kings soon enough— this I pledge upon my bow.
Meow!
